description:
Leo Forte"The Force"Ht: 5'9" WT: 170lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0) Lifetime W/L record (8-3)Race Cooper"The Crusher"Ht: 5'11" WT: 170lbsSeason W/L record (0-0)Lifetime W/L record (3-3)
More relentless than ever, Leo Forte and Race Cooper are back and neither one is going down without a fight. Both are very experienced here on NK and have strict martial arts backgrounds. Race gives Leo a hard suplex and puts him through rigorous holds. Leo somehow finds the strength in him to fight back with all his might, grabbing Race by the balls and putting him in a tough full nelson. With cocks hard and eyes set on victory, who will win this epic bought?
title: Leo "The Force" Forte vs Race "The Crusher" Cooper
